title: Module 6: Conversational Robotics
description: Welcome to Module 6, where we delve into the exciting frontier of Conversational Robotics. This module explores how to empower robots with the ability to understand and respond to human language, transforming them from mere machines into intelligent, interactive companions. The ability for robots to communicate effectively with humans is not just a convenience; it's a critical step towards seamless integration into our daily lives and collaborative environments.
